cloneStrategy.description: specify clone strategy, include empty, snapshot and sync, default empty(option)

copies.description: The number of copies of the newly created cluster data, consistent with the number of copies set in PD

exclusive.description: Whether the newly created cluster is exclusive to physical resources, when exclusive, a host will only deploy instances of the same cluster, which may result in poor resource utilization

region.description: The Region where the cluster is located

copies.description: The number of copies of the newly created cluster data, consistent with the number of copies set in PD

exclusive.description: Whether the newly created cluster is exclusive to physical resources, when exclusive, a host will only deploy instances of the same cluster, which may result in poor resource utilization

region.description: The Region where the cluster is located

copies.description: The number of copies of the newly created cluster data, consistent with the number of copies set in PD

exclusive.description: Whether the newly created cluster is exclusive to physical resources, when exclusive, a host will only deploy instances of the same cluster, which may result in poor resource utilization

region.description: The Region where the cluster is located

copies.description: The number of copies of the newly created cluster data, consistent with the number of copies set in PD

exclusive.description: Whether the newly created cluster is exclusive to physical resources, when exclusive, a host will only deploy instances of the same cluster, which may result in poor resource utilization

vendor.description: DBUser                   string    `json:"dbUser"` //The username and password for the newly created database cluster, default is the root user, which is not valid for Data Migration clusters

id.description: ID of the instance resource specification

memory.description: The amount of memory occupied by the instance, in GiB

name.description: Name of the instance resource specification,eg: TiDB.c1.large

status.description: Disk Status, 0 for available, 1 for inused

clusterType.description: What cluster is the host used for? [database/data migration]

cpuCores.description: Host cpu cores spec, init while importing

loadStat.description: Host Resource Stat, 0 for loadless, 1 for inused, 2 for exhaust

purpose.description: What Purpose is the host used for? [compute/storage/schedule]

reserved.description: Whether this host is reserved - will not be allocated

status.description: Host Status, 0 for Online, 1 for offline

usedMemory.description: Unused memory size, Unit:GiB, used for allocation

vendorId.description: the vendor ID of the vendor, e.go AWS

vendorName.description: the Vendor name of the vendor, e.g AWS/Aliyun

availableZones.description: Information on the specifications of the resources online for the running of product components,organized by different Zone

id.description: ID of the product component, globally unique

maxInstance.description: Maximum number of instances when the product component is running, e.g. PD can run up to 7 instances, other components have no upper limit

minInstance.description: Minimum number of instances of product components at runtime, e.g. at least 1 instance of PD, at least 3 instances of TiKV

name.description: Name of the product component, globally unique

purposeType.description: The type of resources required by the product component at runtime, e.g. storage class

id.description: The ID of the product consists of the product ID

name.description: The name of the product consists of the product name and the version

arch.description: Arch information of the product, e.g. X86/X86_64

version.description: Version information of the product, e.g. v5.0.0

memory.description: The amount of memory occupied by the instance, in GiB

name.description: Name of the resource specification,eg: TiDB.c1.large

id.description: The value of the VendorID is similar to AWS

name.description: The value of the Name is similar to AWS

regionId.description: The value of the RegionID is similar to CN-HANGZHOU

regionName.description: The value of the Name is similar to East China(Hangzhou)

vendorId.description: The value of the VendorID is similar to AWS

vendorName.description: The value of the Name is similar to AWS

zoneId.description: The value of the ZoneID is similar to CN-HANGZHOU-H

zoneName.description: The value of the Name is similar to Hangzhou(H)
